description.en_US: Universal SQLite database operations tool for workflow data management
description.zh_Hans: 通用SQLite数据库操作工具，用于工作流数据管理

description.en_US: Insert a record into specified table
description.zh_Hans: 向指定表插入一条记录

parameters.name: table

human_description.en_US: Name of the database table to insert data into
human_description.zh_Hans: 要插入数据的数据库表名

parameters.llm_description: The name of the SQLite table where data will be inserted. Common tables: topics, workflow_data, user_sessions, configurations

parameters.name: data

human_description.en_US: JSON string containing the data to insert
human_description.zh_Hans: 包含要插入数据的JSON字符串

parameters.llm_description: JSON string containing key-value pairs of data to insert. Format: {"column1": "value1", "column2": "value2"}

description.en_US: Query records from specified table with conditions
description.zh_Hans: 从指定表按条件查询记录

parameters.name: table

human_description.en_US: Name of the database table to query

parameters.llm_description: The name of the SQLite table to query data from. Common tables: topics, workflow_data, user_sessions, configurations

parameters.name: conditions
parameters.llm_description: JSON string with query conditions. Format: {"column": "value"}. Use * for wildcards. Empty {} for all records

parameters.name: limit

human_description.en_US: Maximum number of records to return

parameters.llm_description: Maximum number of records to return (1-100)

parameters.name: order_by

human_description.en_US: Column and order for sorting results
human_description.zh_Hans: 结果排序的列名和顺序

parameters.llm_description: Sort order specification like 'created_at DESC' or 'id ASC'

description.en_US: Update a record in specified table

parameters.name: table

human_description.en_US: Name of the database table to update

parameters.llm_description: The name of the SQLite table containing the record to update

parameters.name: record_id

human_description.en_US: ID of the record to update

parameters.llm_description: The unique ID of the record to update

parameters.name: data

human_description.en_US: JSON string containing the data to update
human_description.zh_Hans: 包含要更新数据的JSON字符串

parameters.llm_description: JSON string with key-value pairs of columns to update. Format: {"column1": "new_value1"}

description.en_US: Get table structure and statistics information
description.zh_Hans: 获取表结构和统计信息

parameters.name: table

human_description.en_US: Name of the table to get information about

parameters.llm_description: Name of the SQLite table to get structure and statistics for
